title: Bright and Dark Slope Streaks in Arabia Terra
description: Slope streaks are generally small features, and have an interior roughness that is finer than the width of the streak itself. A high resolution image can help identify the characteristics of this roughness.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
